byline.original: By WINNIE HU and KATE PASTOR

abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Steven Barrett finds Gerald Vaughn, retired New York City correction captain, guilty of first-degree gang assault and other charges in 2012 beating of former Rikers Island inmate Jahmal Lightfoot; in same ruling, Correction Officers Harmon Frierson and Dwayne Maynard are convicted of official misconduct; defendants are among nine current and former correction officers tried together in connection with beating of Lightfoot and subsequent cover-up of incident.
lead_paragraph: A retired captain was found guilty of first-degree attempted gang assault and two other officers were convicted of official misconduct in a case that helped expose a culture of violence at Rikers.

headline.main: 3 More Officers Convicted in 2012 Beating of an Inmate at Rikers Island
